wikipedia_page.main: Lyndon John Dykes (born 7 October 1995) is an association footballer who plays as a striker for EFL Championship club Queens Park Rangers. Born in Australia, he represents the Scotland national team. Dykes previously played for Merrimac, Redlands United and Surfers Paradise Apollo in Australia, and for Queen of the South and Livingston in Scotland.

response: *Record Transfer Fee Paid: £200,000 for Lyndon Dykes (Queen of the South, 2019)
*Record Transfer Fee Received: £2,000,000 for Lyndon Dykes (Queens Park Rangers, 2020)

Her younger brother Lyndon Dykes is a professional association football footballer who plays for Queens Park Rangers and the Scotland national team.Lyndon Dykes: Livingston striker still silent on Scotland or Australia, BBC Sport, 25 July 2020
